Class PlayerUnitTypeRanged

  • java.lang.Object

        • unitControlModule.unitWrappers.PlayerUnitTypeRanged
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javaGOAP.IGoapUnit, RetreatUnit, SmartlyMovingPerformer, IPlayerUnitWrapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerUnitTerran_Goliath, PlayerUnitTerran_Marine, PlayerUnitTerran_Medic, PlayerUnitTerran_SiegeTank, PlayerUnitTerran_Vulture

    public abstract class PlayerUnitTypeRanged
extends PlayerUnit
    PlayerUnitTypeRanged.java --- Class for ranged Units. This class provides basic functionalities that these types of Units require (confidence calculation etc.).
    Author:
    P H - 01.08.2017
